45 template <typename PolynomialType>
46 class NasaDB : public ThermoDB
47 {
48 public:
49  NasaDB()
50  : ThermoDB(298.15, 101325.0), m_ns(0)
51  { }
52 
53  virtual ~NasaDB() {};
54 
55  virtual bool speciesThermoValidAtT(const size_t i, const double T) const {
56  assert(i < m_ns);
57  return (T > m_polynomials[i].minT() && T <= m_polynomials[i].maxT());
58  }
59 
60  void cp(
61  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel,
62  double* const cp, double* const cpt, double* const cpr,
63  double* const cpv, double* const cpel);
64 
65  void enthalpy(
66  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel,
67  double* const h, double* const ht, double* const hr, double* const hv,
68  double* const hel, double* const hf);
69 
70  void entropy(
71  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double P,
72  double* const s, double* const st, double* const sr, double* const sv,
73  double* const sel);
74 
75  void gibbs(
76  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double P,
77  double* const g, double* const gt, double* const gr, double* const gv,
78  double* const gel);
79 
80 protected:
81 
82  void loadAvailableSpecies(std::list<Species>& species_list);
83 
84  void loadThermodynamicData();
85 
86  virtual std::string filename() const = 0;
87 
88  virtual void skipHeader(std::ifstream& is) const = 0;
89 
90  virtual Species loadSpecies(std::ifstream& is) const = 0;
91 
92  virtual void loadPolynomials(
93  std::ifstream& is, std::vector<PolynomialType>& polynomials) = 0;
94 
95 private:
96 
97  size_t m_ns;
98  std::vector<PolynomialType> m_polynomials;
99  double mp_params[8];
100 };
101 
102 template <typename PolynomialType>
103 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::cp(
104  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel,
105  double* const cp, double* const cpt, double* const cpr,
106  double* const cpv, double* const cpel)
107 {
108 
109  if (cp != NULL) {
110  PolynomialType::computeParams(Th, mp_params, PolynomialType::CP);
111  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_ns; ++i)
112  m_polynomials[i].cp(mp_params, cp[i]);
113  }
114 
115  if (cpt != NULL) std::fill(cpt, cpt+m_ns, 0.0);
116  if (cpr != NULL) std::fill(cpr, cpr+m_ns, 0.0);
117  if (cpv != NULL) std::fill(cpv, cpv+m_ns, 0.0);
118  if (cpel != NULL) std::fill(cpel, cpel+m_ns, 0.0);
119 }
120 
121 template <typename PolynomialType>
122 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::enthalpy(
123  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel,
124  double* const h, double* const ht, double* const hr, double* const hv,
125  double* const hel, double* const hf)
126 {
127  if (h != NULL) {
128  PolynomialType::computeParams(Th, mp_params, PolynomialType::ENTHALPY);
129  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_ns; ++i)
130  m_polynomials[i].enthalpy(mp_params, h[i]);
131  }
132 
133  if (ht != NULL) std::fill(ht, ht+m_ns, 0.0);
134  if (hr != NULL) std::fill(hr, hr+m_ns, 0.0);
135  if (hv != NULL) std::fill(hv, hv+m_ns, 0.0);
136  if (hel != NULL) std::fill(hel, hel+m_ns, 0.0);
137  if (hf != NULL) std::fill(hf, hf+m_ns, 0.0);
138 }
139 
140 template <typename PolynomialType>
141 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::entropy(
142  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double P,
143  double* const s, double* const st, double* const sr, double* const sv,
144  double* const sel)
145 {
146  if (s != NULL) {
147  PolynomialType::computeParams(Th, mp_params, PolynomialType::ENTROPY);
148  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_ns; ++i)
149  m_polynomials[i].entropy(mp_params, s[i]);
150  }
151 
152  if (st != NULL) std::fill(st, st+m_ns, 0.0);
153  if (sr != NULL) std::fill(sr, sr+m_ns, 0.0);
154  if (sv != NULL) std::fill(sv, sv+m_ns, 0.0);
155  if (sel != NULL) std::fill(sel, sel+m_ns, 0.0);
156 }
157 
158 template <typename PolynomialType>
159 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::gibbs(
160  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double P,
161  double* const g, double* const gt, double* const gr, double* const gv,
162  double* const gel)
163 {
164  if (g != NULL) {
165  PolynomialType::computeParams(Th, mp_params, PolynomialType::GIBBS);
166  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_ns; ++i)
167  m_polynomials[i].gibbs(mp_params, g[i]);
168  }
169 
170  if (gt != NULL) std::fill(gt, gt+m_ns, 0.0);
171  if (gr != NULL) std::fill(gr, gr+m_ns, 0.0);
172  if (gv != NULL) std::fill(gv, gv+m_ns, 0.0);
173  if (gel != NULL) std::fill(gel, gel+m_ns, 0.0);
174 }
175 
176 template <typename PolynomialType>
177 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::loadAvailableSpecies(
178  std::list<Species>& species_list)
179 {
180  // Open the database file
181  std::string db_path =
182  Utilities::databaseFileName(filename(), "thermo", ".dat");
183  std::ifstream file(db_path.c_str());
184 
185  if (!file.is_open()) {
186  throw FileNotFoundError(db_path)
187  << "Could not find thermodynamic database.";
188  }
189 
190  // Move to the beginning of the first species
191  skipHeader(file);
192 
193  // Load all of the available species until we reach the end of the file
194  species_list.push_back(loadSpecies(file));
195  while (species_list.back().name() != "")
196  species_list.push_back(loadSpecies(file));
197  species_list.pop_back();
198 
199  // Close the database file
200  file.close();
201 }
202 
203 template <typename PolynomialType>
204 void NasaDB<PolynomialType>::loadThermodynamicData()
205 {
206  // Open the database file
207  std::string db_path =
208  Utilities::databaseFileName(filename(), "thermo", ".dat");
209  std::ifstream file(db_path.c_str());
210 
211  if (!file.is_open()) {
212  throw FileNotFoundError(db_path)
213  << "Could not find thermodynamic database.";
214  }
215 
216  // Move to the beginning of the first species
217  skipHeader(file);
218 
219  // Ask the concrete class to fill the polynomials
220  m_ns = species().size();
221  m_polynomials.resize(m_ns);
222  loadPolynomials(file, m_polynomials);
223 
224  // Close the database file
225  file.close();
226 }
227 
228  } // namespace Thermodynamics
229 } // namespace Mutation
